title: Gas Pipeline Right-of-Way Patrol
description: A technician is patrolling a gas pipeline right-of-way and observes unauthorized construction activity near the pipeline.

tasks.description: The technician immediately approaches the construction crew to inform them of the pipeline's presence and order them to stop work.
tasks.expected_outcome: Technician follows safety protocol to prevent a potential line strike.

tasks.description: The technician logs the incident, including the location, name of the construction company, and photos of the activity.
tasks.expected_outcome: Technician documents the incident in the compliance system.

tasks.description: The system automatically generates a formal notification to the construction company regarding the encroachment.
tasks.expected_outcome: System sends a formal warning and stop-work notice.
